newsitem.title: USA: Safeguard Scientifics offering in effect.
newsitem.headline: Safeguard Scientifics offering in effect.

text.p: Safeguard Scientifics Inc said on Wednesday that a rights offering filed by its ChromaVision Medical Systems Inc unit become effective July 1.

Safeguard Scientifics, a strategic information systems company, said ChromaVision offered rights to Safeguard holders to buy roughly 6.4 million shares its common stock. The ex-rights date for trading in Safeguard stock will be July 3.

Safeguard said in late June its shareholders would receive one transferrable right to buy one ChromaVision share for every five Safeguard shares. Each right will allow the holder to buy one ChromaVision common share for $5, Safeguard said.
ChromaVision develops an automated intelligent microscope system used in diagnostic and research applications.
Safeguard shares were up 7/16 to 31-3/8 at midday.
